co2-calculation: directly from source, estimation from fig. 4.3 hering without oil and canning = 1.3 kg CO2eq/kg + storate & distribution from cod 0.8 kg CO2eq/kg = 2.1 kg CO2eq/kg, canning with oi + 3kg CO2eq/kg
other-references: 1. Blonk et al. 2008 Milieueffecten van Nederlandse consumptie van eiwitrijke producten. Blonk Milieu Advies in opdracht van VROM -> page 24, table 3.3 =  1.1 kg CO2/kg, not sure if the CO2-end value is on filet or on the complete fish.
references: 1. Buchspiess et al., 2011. Life Cycle Assessment of high sea fish vs salmon aquaculture - vielestudien. ESU Services. Page 12 text and fig. 4.3
calculation-process-documentation:
from fishery to retail, without packaging and oil, including transportation to Switzerland 

pelagic fishery industry, Denmark, fish to fillet factor 0.46
name: Hering
